      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String key,
        GetSocial.OperationObserver observer)
        Initializes the GetSocial SDK, it must be called right after GetSocial.getInstance(Context applicationContext) before using any other functionality offered by the SDK.
        Parameters:
        key - App Key as shown on the Developer Portal
        observer - An observer that will be called if the initialization succeeds or fails.

      • getLeaderboards

        public void getLeaderboards(java.util.List<java.lang.String> leaderboardIds,
                   GetSocial.OnOperationResultListener<java.util.List<Leaderboard>> listener)
        Gets leaderboards by array of identifiers.
        Parameters:
        leaderboardIds - An array of identifiers of the leaderboard.
        listener - A listener that will receive the result of this operation.

      • getLeaderboards

        public void getLeaderboards(int offset,
                   int count,
                   GetSocial.OnOperationResultListener<java.util.List<Leaderboard>> listener)
        Gets leaderboards page by page.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset from which leaderboards will be retrieved.
        count - The count of the leaderboards. Could be less than expected if there are less leaderboards.
        listener - A listener that will receive the result of this operation.

      • getLeaderboardScores

        public void getLeaderboardScores(java.lang.String leaderboardId,
                        int offset,
                        int count,
                        int scoreType,
                        GetSocial.OnOperationResultListener<java.util.List<LeaderboardScore>> listener)
        Gets scores page by page.
        Parameters:
        leaderboardId - The identifier of the leaderboard.
        offset - The offset from which scores will be retrieved.
        count - The count of the scores. Could be less than expected if there are less scores.
        scoreType - The type of score to retrieve SCORE_TYPE_WORLD, SCORE_TYPE_FOLLOWING or SCORE_TYPE_OTHERS
        listener - A listener that will receive the result of this operation.

      • postActivity

        public void postActivity(java.lang.String text,
                byte[] image,
                java.lang.String buttonText,
                java.lang.String action,
                java.lang.String tags,
                GetSocial.OperationObserver operationObserver)
        Post an activity on the activity feed.
        Parameters:
        text - The text of the activity, or null if no text should be shown.
        image - The image of the activity, or null if no image should be shown.
        buttonText - The text of the activity button, or null if no button text should be shown.
        action - The action generated on click, or null if no button or image is shown.
        operationObserver - An observer that will be notified of the operations outcome.

        public void registerPlugin(java.lang.String provider,
                  Plugin plugin)
        Register a new instance of a plugin for a specified provider.

      • getSupportedInviteProviders

        public java.lang.String[] getSupportedInviteProviders()
        Returns all supported invite providers.
        Returns:
        Array containing constants of all supported providers

      • inviteFriendsUsingProvider

        public void inviteFriendsUsingProvider(java.lang.String provider,
                              java.lang.String subject,
                              java.lang.String text,
                              Bitmap image,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> referralData)
        Invite friends through a specific invite provider.
        Parameters:
        provider - The provider through which the invite will be sent.
        subject - The subject to be sent with the invite. If it is null the default subject is sent.
        text - The text to be sent with the invite. If it is null the default text is sent.
        image - The image to be sent with the invite. If it is null the default image will be sent.
        referralData - The referral data to be sent with the invite. It can be null.

      • login

        public void login(IdentityInfo identityInfo,
         GetSocial.LoginObserver callback)
        Logs in a user with a provided identity information.
        Parameters:
        identityInfo - identity info of the user.
        callback - called when the user is successfully logged in or when the login failed.

      • logout

        public void logout(GetSocial.LogoutObserver callback)
        Logs out the current user.
        Parameters:
        callback - called when the clear operation completed.

                   GetSocial.UpdateIdentityInfoObserver callback)
        Adds Social User Identity Info for the specified provider.
        Parameters:
        identityInfo - identity info of the user.
        callback - called when the user is successfully updated or when the update failed.

                      GetSocial.UpdateIdentityInfoObserver callback)

        public void closeView()
        Close the GetSocial UI temporarily, it can later be restored by calling restoreView().

      • closeView

        public void closeView(boolean saveViewState)
        Close the GetSocial UI.
        Parameters:
        saveViewState - Pass true if the state of the GetSocial UI needs to be restored later by calling restoreView().

      • restoreView

        public void restoreView()
        Restores the state of the GetSocial UI to what it was when closeView() or closeView(false) was last called.

      • setInviteFriendsListener

        public void setInviteFriendsListener(GetSocial.InviteFriendsListener inviteFriendsListener)
        Provide an InviteFriendsListener if you would like to receive callbacks related to the user inviting friends.
        Parameters:
        inviteFriendsListener - The listener that will receive callbacks.

      • getInviteFriendsListener

        public GetSocial.InviteFriendsListener getInviteFriendsListener()

      • setOnUserAvatarClickHandler

        public void setOnUserAvatarClickHandler(GetSocial.OnUserAvatarClickHandler onUserAvatarClickHandler)
        Register a handler to override GetSocial's default behaviour while clicking on a user avatar. Any click on an avatar from anywhere in the SDK will call this handler.
        Parameters:
        onUserAvatarClickHandler - The handler that will be called.

      • onUserAvatarClickIntent

        public void onUserAvatarClickIntent(im.getsocial.sdk.core.resources.entities.User user)

      • setOnAppAvatarClickHandler

        public void setOnAppAvatarClickHandler(GetSocial.OnAppAvatarClickHandler onAppAvatarClickHandler)
        Register a handler to override GetSocial's default behaviour while clicking on the app avatar. Any click on an avatar from the activity feed will call this handler.
        Parameters:
        onAppAvatarClickHandler - The handler that will be called.
